object.name: InputSticker
object.description: This object describes a sticker to be added to a sticker set.
object.html_description: This object describes a sticker to be added to a sticker set.
object.rst_description: This object describes a sticker to be added to a sticker set.

annotations.description: The added sticker. Pass a file_id as a String to send a file that already exists on the Telegram servers, pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' to upload a new file using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. Animated and video stickers can't be uploaded via HTTP URL. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: The added sticker. Pass a file_id as a String to send a file that already exists on the Telegram servers, pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass “attach://<file_attach_name>” to upload a new file using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. Animated and video stickers can't be uploaded via HTTP URL. More information on Sending Files »
annotations.rst_description: The added sticker. Pass a *file_id* as a String to send a file that already exists on the Telegram servers, pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' to upload a new file using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. Animated and video stickers can't be uploaded via HTTP URL. :ref:`More information on Sending Files Â» <sending-files>`
annotations.name: sticker

annotations.description: Format of the added sticker, must be one of 'static' for a .WEBP or .PNG image, 'animated' for a .TGS animation, 'video' for a .WEBM video
annotations.html_description: Format of the added sticker, must be one of “static” for a .WEBP or .PNG image, “animated” for a .TGS animation, “video” for a .WEBM video
annotations.rst_description: Format of the added sticker, must be one of 'static' for a **.WEBP** or **.PNG** image, 'animated' for a **.TGS** animation, 'video' for a **.WEBM** video
annotations.name: format

annotations.description: List of 1-20 emoji associated with the sticker
annotations.html_description: List of 1-20 emoji associated with the sticker
annotations.rst_description: List of 1-20 emoji associated with the sticker
annotations.name: emoji_list

annotations.description: Position where the mask should be placed on faces. For 'mask' stickers only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Position where the mask should be placed on faces. For “mask” stickers only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Position where the mask should be placed on faces. For 'mask' stickers only.
annotations.name: mask_position

annotations.description: List of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters. For 'regular' and 'custom_emoji' stickers only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters. For “regular” and “custom_emoji” stickers only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters. For 'regular' and 'custom_emoji' stickers only.
annotations.name: keywords
